overview.en:
P Token is the first 1-character token contract created on EOS blockchain. The total supply of 7.5 Billion reflects the total population of the world, and will inflate and deflate according to changes in the population.
When you buy pixels with EOS, we will aidrop 1000 times the amount in P token to your EOS account instantly. P also represents your account level in all our upcoming games, allowing players to unlock exclusive items and extra features as they level up. P will be used only as currency for in-game purchase, such as 'special pixel art stamps', team power-ups and exclusive flags. 
After all our games are launched on EOS, we will transition from a centralized to decentralized gaming platform. All P token holders will become shareholders and are entitled to all profit generated from games.
